cluster.name: oaswarm
cluster.master-userdata: #!/bin/bash; apt-get update apt-get -y upgrade; apt-get install -y wget software-properties-common;  wget -q https://test.docker.com/ -O /root/install_docker.sh ; chmod 755 /root/install_docker.sh ;  /bin/bash /root/install_docker.sh ;  docker swarm init --listen-addr 0.0.0.0:2377
